headline: ACMR vs. AMAT: Which Semiconductor Equipment Stock Has the Edge?
summary: As China boosts domestic fabs, ACMR gains ground. AMAT leads in AI chip tech. Both face new challenges as steep tariffs reshape the semiconductor niche.
